device.deviceconfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <specific> <!-- Autoprovisioned values will be written on boot.
To use autoprovisioning, create a copy of this file with the desired settings and name this file with the mac address of the device to configure (for example: 0020f7350058.xml). Put this file into your hosted directory and manually set the hosting server address.
Alternately you can set your dhcp server to provide the autoprovisioning server address in OPTION 43, 72, 150, or 66.
On boot the device will download its autoprovisioning file and configure itself with those settings.
Though every setting that can be changed via autoprovisioning is shown below, it isn't necessary to set every value.
See the documentation for other ways you can organize your autoprovisioning files. -->
<MiscSettings> {IF ua=CyberData SIP Call Button} <DeviceName>SIP Call Button</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Indoor Intercom} <DeviceName>Indoor Intercom</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Outdoor Keypad Intercom} <DeviceName>Outdoor Keypad Intercom</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Office Ringer} <DeviceName>Office Ringer</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Strobe} <DeviceName>SIP Strobe</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData v3.1 SPA} <DeviceName>SIP Paging Adapter</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=Paging Server} <DeviceName>Paging Server</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Outdoor Intercom} <DeviceName>Outdoor Intercom</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Indoor Keypad Intercom} <DeviceName>Indoor Keypad Intercom</DeviceName> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Emergency Intercom} <DeviceName>Emergency Intercom</DeviceName> {ENDIF} <!-- <AutoprovFile>common.xml</AutoprovFile>--> <!-- <AutoprovFile>sip_reg[macaddress].xml</AutoprovFile>--> <!-- <AutoprovFile>audio[macaddress]</AutoprovFile>--> <!-- <AutoprovFile>device[macaddress].xml</AutoprovFile>--> </MiscSettings>
<AutoprovSettings> <DisableAutoprov>No</DisableAutoprov> <AutoprovServer>%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%</AutoprovServer> <AutoprovFilename>%%mac_address%%.xml</AutoprovFilename> <AutoprovUsername></AutoprovUsername> <AutoprovPassword></AutoprovPassword> <UseTFTP>No</UseTFTP> <AutoprovAutoupdate>0</AutoprovAutoupdate> <AutoprovAtTime></AutoprovAtTime> <AutoprovWhenIdle>0</AutoprovWhenIdle> </AutoprovSettings>
<IPSettings> <IPAddressMode>DHCP</IPAddressMode> <!-- <IPAddressMode>Static</IPAddressMode> --> <IPAddress>10.10.10.10</IPAddress> <SubnetMask>255.0.0.0</SubnetMask> <Gateway>10.0.0.1</Gateway> <DNS1>10.0.0.1</DNS1> <DNS2>10.0.0.1</DNS2> <Hostname>ChangeFromDefault</Hostname> <DHCPTimeout>60</DHCPTimeout> <VLANID>0</VLANID> <VLANPriority>0</VLANPriority> </IPSettings>
<SIPSettings> <EnableSIPOperation>Yes</EnableSIPOperation> <SIPServer>%%pbx_ip%%</SIPServer> <SIPUserID>%%extension_number%%</SIPUserID> <SIPAuthID>%%extension_auth_id%%</SIPAuthID> <SIPAuthPassword>%%extension_auth_pw%%</SIPAuthPassword> <RemoteSIPPort>%%param::sipport%%</RemoteSIPPort> <LocalSIPPort>5060</LocalSIPPort> <OutboundProxy></OutboundProxy> <OutboundProxyPort>0</OutboundProxyPort> <SIPRegisterOnBoot>Yes</SIPRegisterOnBoot> <SIPRegistrationTimeout>120</SIPRegistrationTimeout> <KeepAlive>10000</KeepAlive> <DisableRportDiscovery>No</DisableRportDiscovery>
{IF blf1} <DialoutExtension0>%%blf1%%</DialoutExtension0> <DialoutID0>%%extension_number%%</DialoutID0> {ELSE} <DialoutExtension0></DialoutExtension0> <DialoutID0></DialoutID0> {ENDIF}
</SIPSettings>
<ClockSettings> <NTPServer>%%param::time_ntp_server%%</NTPServer> <NTPTimezone>%%param::time_timezone_cyberdata%%</NTPTimezone> <NTPOnBoot>Yes</NTPOnBoot> <NTPAutoupdate>Yes</NTPAutoupdate> <NTPAutoupdateDelay>24</NTPAutoupdateDelay> </ClockSettings>
{IF ua=CyberData Outdoor Keypad Intercom} <ButtonSettings> <PlayButtonTone>Yes</PlayButtonTone>
<!--<DialMode>Telephone</DialMode>--> <!--<DialMode>Speed_Dial</DialMode>--> <!--<DialMode>Cellphone</DialMode>--> <DialMode>Security</DialMode> </ButtonSettings> {ENDIF}
{IF ua=CyberData Indoor Keypad Intercom} <ButtonSettings> <PlayButtonTone>Yes</PlayButtonTone>
<!--<DialMode>Telephone</DialMode>--> <!--<DialMode>Speed_Dial</DialMode>--> <!--<DialMode>Cellphone</DialMode>--> <DialMode>Security</DialMode> </ButtonSettings> {ENDIF}
</specific>
